ns2:test-suite.name: As a resident from England, Scotland, Wales, Northren Ireland I need to know estimate of electrical appliances cost to run

test-case.name: As a resident from England I need to know appliances cost to run
test-case.title: As a resident from England I need to know appliances cost to run

step.name: Given I navigate to the URL "https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/energy/energy-supply/get-help-paying-your-bills/check-how-much-your-electrical-appliances-cost-to-use/"
step.title: Given I navigate to the URL "https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/energy/energy-supply/get-help-paying-your-bills/check-how-much-your-electrical-appliances-cost-to-use/"

step.name: Then I should see Energy Cost Calculator Page
step.title: Then I should see Energy Cost Calculator Page

step.name: Then I Select Advice Applies to England
step.title: Then I Select Advice Applies to England

step.name: And I enter "34" kwh
step.title: And I enter "34" kwh

step.name: When I select appliance "PC or desktop computer"
step.title: When I select appliance "PC or desktop computer"

step.name: Then I enter "8" hours
step.title: Then I enter "8" hours

step.name: And I enter "00" minutes
step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.name: And I Click on Add Appliance
step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "PC or desktop computer" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "PC or desktop computer" appliance added to the list

step.name: When I select appliance "Dishwasher"
step.title: When I select appliance "Dishwasher"

step.name: Then I enter "2" hours
step.title: Then I enter "2" hours

step.name: And I enter "00" minutes
step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.name: And I Click on Add Appliance
step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "Dishwasher" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "Dishwasher" appliance added to the list

step.name: Then I enter "2" hours
step.title: Then I enter "2" hours

step.name: And I enter "00" minutes
step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "Washing machine" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "Washing machine" appliance added to the list

step.name: When I select appliance "Light bulb - energy-saving CFL"
step.title: When I select appliance "Light bulb - energy-saving CFL"

step.name: Then I enter "6" hours

step.name: And I enter "00" minutes
step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.name: And I Click on Add Appliance
step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "Light bulb - energy-saving CFL" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "Light bulb - energy-saving CFL" appliance added to the list

step.name: When I select appliance "Light bulb - energy-saving LED"
step.title: When I select appliance "Light bulb - energy-saving LED"

step.name: Then I enter "6" hours
step.title: Then I enter "6" hours

step.name: And I enter "00" minutes
step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "Light bulb - energy-saving LED" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "Light bulb - energy-saving LED" appliance added to the list

step.name: When I select appliance "TV"
step.title: When I select appliance "TV"

step.name: Then I enter "4" hours
step.title: Then I enter "4" hours

step.name: And I enter "00" minutes
step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.name: And I Click on Add Appliance
step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "TV" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "TV" appliance added to the list

step.name: When I select appliance "Microwave"
step.title: When I select appliance "Microwave"

step.name: Then I enter "1" hours
step.title: Then I enter "1" hours

step.title: And I enter "00" minutes

step.title: And I Click on Add Appliance

step.name: Then I verify "Microwave" appliance added to the list
step.title: Then I verify "Microwave" appliance added to the list
